comments:
Perhaps it's better if we just fail silently?  Or put a message in the status
area?  Or just keep the corresponding report italic?

I have made this fail silently unless we know that it is a login error.  This
means that the bug is left italic if there is a problem as well, a message should
be displayed in the status line.

The bug being left in italic is a perfect, since it indicates the failed update
to the user.
